...}鸭亚科（学名：Anatinae）是雁形目鸭科下的一个亚科，其下的物种通常被称为「浅层水鸭」（dabbling ducks），在水面觅食，不会潜入水中。鸭亚科还包含已灭绝的Moa-nalo|Moa-nalo，是和浅层水鸭演化关系接近的另一支.
She dabbles in painting as a hobby ., 她学点绘画作为业余爱好.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from obsolete Dutch dabbelen, or a frequentative of the verb dab

entry.def: If you dabble in something, you take part in it but not very seriously

means.word_mean: 1. dip a foot or hand briefly into a liquid
2. play in or as if in water, as of small children
3. work with in a non-serious manner;

sentences.sentence: "He plays around with investments bu he never makes any money"
